questions.question: Q1. Which of the following method is not used to design state feedback controller?
Q2. What is the necessary condition for pole placement using state feedback design?

answers.a: All poles must be lies on the left half of the s plane
answers.d: Rank of the controllability matrix should be less than the order of the system

questions.question: Q3. What is the assumption considered to design state feedback control?

answers.d: All poles must be lies on the left half of the s plane

questions.question: Q4. What is the design goal of the state feedback control?

answers.b: To cancel the steady state error

questions.question: Q5. What is the design goal of the pre-compensator?

answers.b: To cancel the steady state error
